metadata.Title: CVE-2022-38247 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: Nagios XI v5.8.6 was discovered to contain a cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability via the System Settings page under the Admin panel.

criterions.comment: icinga: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
nagios3: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
